content:
I'm planning on staying in a mix of hotels and lodges during my trip, depending on what's available and convenient. I've already booked a few places in advance, but I'm also leaving some flexibility in my itinerary in case I want to change my plans or stay longer in a particular place.

As for gear, I've got a good set of hiking boots and outdoor clothing, so I'm all set there. I'm planning on bringing a backpack with the usual essentials like water, snacks, sunscreen, and a first aid kit. I've also got a good camera to capture all the amazing scenery and wildlife I'll see along the way.

I'm thinking about buying a portable charger for my phone, though, since I'll be out of cell range for parts of the trip and I don't want to run out of battery when I need to take a photo or navigate. Do you have any recommendations for portable chargers or any other gear that might be useful on my trip?
